GeologicVocabulary.gml:description: A vocabulary of standard material types which may be identified by the URN "urn:x-cgi:lex:material:BGS:2005:matLex1"

ControlledConcept.gml:description: This is an entry from a vocabulary of standard material types denoting the concept whose common name is "mud" which may be identified by the URN "urn:x-cgi:def:material:BGS:2005:matLex1:mud"
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:x-cgi:def:material:BGS:2005:matLex1:mud

ControlledConcept.gml:description: This is an entry from a vocabulary of standard material types denoting the concept whose common name is "sand" which may be identified by the URN "urn:x-cgi:def:material:BGS:2005:matLex1:sand"
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:x-cgi:def:material:BGS:2005:matLex1:sand
